net.pgp2p.cryptoservice
Class PGPManager

java.lang.Object
  net.pgp2p.cryptoservice.PGPManager

public class PGPManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to manage a PGP directory with public and secret keyrings. There's a premise that each secret keyring can only contain one private key. Like it's a directory per user.

Author:
Enderson Maia
